item.title: Lessons on software release
item.description: Oh boy, I screwed up bad, like really badly. Ok ok, let’s go back and see where it all began. I’ve learnt countless lessons from this and I hope you (reader) will too if you’re developing your own software. Story time! 2 months ago, I embarked on a journey to write a markdown to PDF converter, called kMD2PDF. The initial architecture was developed such that: .md file -> .html file + .
